extDescription.message: Get cashback for every order in AliExpress, ASOS, Banggood, GearBest, Hotels.com and 220 Volt stores with Backit plugin

common_onlyCashbackServiceUsers.message: Only cashback service users can use the plugin.

common_notAffiliatedProductTitle.message: You won't get cashback for this product

common_affiliatedProductTooltipText.message: The seller does not participate in the affiliate program. Therefore, according to the rules of AliExpress, cashback will not be charged for this product.

common_affiliatedProductCountryInfo.message: Under the new rules of AliExpress, the cashback will not be counted for this product if it is delivered to the following countries: Russia, Armenia, Azerbaijan, Belarus, Georgia, Kyrgyzstan, Kazakhstan, Tajikistan, Turkmenistan, Uzbekistan, Moldova, because its seller is not involved in the affiliate program.

privacy_title.message: In order to get cashback through the Backit add-on, you need to consent to the following:

privacy_point1.message: Use of cookies. It’s required to charge you cashback for your purchase.

privacy_point2.message: Statistics collection: plugin and browser version.

privacy_point3.message: Modifications of the AliExpress pages (https://aliexpress.com). It is necessary to show you the cashback activation button directly on the AliExpress product page.

privacy_point4.message: Access to search results in Yandex and Google. If there are links to stores where you can get cashback, we display this information to you.

privacy_text1.message: Configurable proxy. We provide the ability to use proxy in our add-on if you are unable to use the plugin for some reason.

privacy_point6.message: When you click on the “Go to Site” button while you visiting AliExpress site, we send the URL of the current page to backit.me. We do this for your convenience to open the product page on which you are now.

privacy_text2.message: Full text of add-on privacy policy:

privacy_error.message: You need to enable all this options. In other way, the add-on won't work correctly.

regionLock_whatIsYourCountryMessage.message: From 6 Jule the changed AliExpress rules to get cashback through a plugin for a number of countries takes effect. The selected country can be changed in the plugin settings.
